title: This games babying of players while punishing players who speak out against trolls needs to stop.
body:
Seriously, there is so much parity going on with Riot Lytes approach to babying the community and SJWs PC tyrade against mean words on the internet.

 We have seen time and time again that Riots ok with players ruining games but LOW AND BEHOLD if you dare talk shit to that troll intentionally ruining your game! Hell they can do it over a period of weeks, doesn't fucking matter but you say one mean word AND HOLY SH$% prepare your anus for the ban hammer!

 When did the internet become a place where people expect a fucking safe space where they get told they are great and never make mistakes while being rewarded with medals for trying... Such a joke and it only makes the community worse.

 The term toxic is so fucking overused now thanks to Riot, can't go one game without someone bitching about a team mate and crying TOXIC TOXIC TOXIC! SOMEONE IS SAYING MEAN WORDS!

 After so many years playing and hundreds of dollars and hours... I think I'm almost at quitting point because I can barely handle how BS this games community has become. Mute button? Whats that? WHY EVEN HAVE A FKN MUTE BUTTON IF WE DONT EXPECT PEOPLE TO USE IT? JESUS CHRIST! Might as well just remove the damn thing at this point with how we treat the playerbase.
